title: conferred on it by section 13 of the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 (No. 41 of
heading: 1. (1) These Rules may be cited as the Nurses and Midwives (Register of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Rules may be cited as the Nurses and Midwives (Register of 

Nurses and Midwives) (Amendment) Rules 2020. 

(2) The Principal Rules and these Rules may be cited together as the Nurses 

and Midwives (Register of Nurses and Midwives) Rules 2018 and 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) rule may cited nurse midwife (register nurse midwives) (amendment) rule 2020 (2) principal rule rule may cited together nurse midwife (register nurse midwives) rule 2018 2020

title: conferred on it by section 13 of the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 (No. 41 of
heading: In these Rules “Principal Rules” means the Nurses and Midwives
text_raw:
2. 

In these Rules “Principal Rules” means the Nurses and Midwives 

(Register of Nurses and Midwives) Rules 2018 (S.I. No. 219 of 2018).
text_norm: 2 rule principal rule mean nurse midwife (register nurse midwives) rule 2018 (s.i no 219 2018)

title: conferred on it by section 13 of the Nurses and Midwives Act 2011 (No. 41 of
heading: 3. Rule 5 of the Principal Rules is amended by substituting for paragraph
text_raw:
3. Rule 5 of the Principal Rules is amended by substituting for paragraph 

(m) the following: 

“(m) 

if applicable, details of current employment as follows: 

(i) 

employment sector; 

(ii) workplace name; 

(iii) workplace address; 

(iv) 

job title; 

(v) 

employment status; 

(vi) whether working in direct patient care / patient facing; 

(vii) employment start date; 

(viii) employment end date; and 

(ix) divisions of register in which practising;”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [503] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Nursing 
 and Midwifery Board of Ireland, 

16 October, 2020. 

ESSENE CASSIDY, 

 President. 

SHEILA MCCLELLAND 

 Chief Executive Officer. 

I, STEPHEN DONNELLY, Minister for Health, approve of the making of the 
foregoing Rules. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 October, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY 

 Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [503]

text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Rules amend the Nurses and Midwives (Register of Nurses and 
Midwives) Rules 2018.
